thread.title: PeterG
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by PeterG

author: PeterG
title: PeterG
text: I couldn't find a replacement piece for my shower. I had scoured the internet. I had been into many plumbing centers, with no luck for a week. Their website site said "send in a photo and we'll identify it for you". Within three days I had my new piece in my hands. Along with very Knowledgeable advice my shower is now up and running. Thank you
